ruleset.name: Design Rules
ruleset.description: The Code Size Ruleset contains a collection of rules that find software design related problems.

rule.name: ExitExpression
rule.description: An exit-expression within regular code is untestable and therefore it should be avoided. Consider to move the exit-expression into some kind of startup script where an error/exception code is returned to the calling environment.

rule.name: EvalExpression
rule.description: An eval-expression is untestable, a security risk and bad practice. Therefore it should be avoided. Consider to replace the eval-expression with regular code.
